true.prompt: Ed-true One day while in the office, you are heading to the restroom. You round a corner and bump into the new secretary. She drops the notepad and coffee mug she was holding onto the carpet, spilling coffee everywhere.
outcomes: 'A case of the Mondays, huh?', you say to her. She glares and you continue to the restroom. On your way back to your desk, you find a credit card in the coffee stain. She must not have realized she dropped it.
You bend to help her pick up her items. 'Everything okay?', you ask. She sighs and reaches down for her mug. 'Ugh, just a case of the Mondays, I guess.' Your hands meet on the coffee mug.
